attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the final Brexit deal.
attributes.background: We call upon HM Government to give the people of the UK the final say on the Brexit deal negotiated by the UK and EU. This would be done through a referendum that would take place prior to the April 2019 exit date.

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like a referendum on the final Brexit deal but we are not sure what options you would like that referendum to consider.

If you would like a referendum that includes the option to remain in the European Union you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/222124

Alternatively, you could start a new petition setting out the options you would like the referendum to consider.
